name: Nodir Turakulov
body:
I am trying to contribute to software development tools industry by making programming more declarative. At [ComponentOne](http://componentone.com) I work on [Wijmo](http://wijmo.com) infrastructure and internal tools used by our team.

[Algorithms and data structures](algo) implemented in Python.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
